title: South Lamar Luxury Apartment *1Mile from Dtown*
map_address: South Lamar near Barton Springs road
posting_body: ['This 78704 community is extremely walkable to some of the most swanky bars and restaurants S. Lamar has to offer as well as the long time Austin staple, Barton Springs.', 'Take your pup for a walk around Lady Bird lake or their expansive dog park.', '(no weight restrictions)', 'Large, open floor plan, central location, awesome pool and 24 hour gym.', 'Live the high life Downtown at a solid price with plenty of elbow room.', 'Feed your musical taste buds at the historic Broken Spoke or quench your thirst and listen to live music at The Saxon Pub.', 'Awesome 702 sq.', 'ft. 1/1s start at a tad over $1,882 (prorated)', 'Call/text me to check it out today.', 'Trent Guerra', 'Apartment Locator + Sales Manager', 'Apartment Hunters LLC', '(8 1 7) 9 9 9-8 8 2 9', "** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!", 'Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!', '**']
